entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of thunderstorms. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
